Hello i made a model of Eve lander that can land on planet eve and (hopefully) get back in LEO.I am giving away model because i dont have time to finish it so I am giving it away to you to finish it.NOTE:Carrier rocket is just sketch up model.PLEASE dont change the model(too much).I am looking foward to it.:D

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/105164961/EVE%20express.blend
